topic.title: Password management
topic.shortdesc: The change password form is in the main tab menu Settings

body.p: It is necessary to enter and confirm your password before update. The administrator can disable this functionality. The change the password fields do not appear in this case (see ).

In case the user lost their password, the ability to reset it is proposed from the login page. The link is only present if notifications are enabled (see ). Only users with an email address defined in GLPI and do not authenticate via an external source (LDAP, mail server, etc.) can use this feature. Once the password reset form is completed by entering their email address, the user receives an email providing a link to reset the password.
